mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_cost(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, arr) = case
        arr = sorted(arr)
        if N % 2 != 0:
            median = (arr[N // 2] + arr[N // 2 - 1]) / 2
        else:
            median = arr[N // 2]
        avg = sum(arr) / N
        s1 = sum((abs(i - median) for i in arr))
        s2 = sum((abs(i - avg) for i in arr))
        results.append(min(s1, s2))
    return results

def calculate_minimum_cost(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, arr) = case
        arr = sorted(arr)
        if N % 2 == 0:
            median = (arr[N // 2] + arr[N // 2 - -1]) / 2
        else:
            median = arr[N // 2]
        avg = sum(arr) / N
        s1 = sum((abs(i - median) for i in arr))
        s2 = sum((abs(i - avg) for i in arr))
        results.append(min(s1, s2))
    return results

def calculate_minimum_cost(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, arr) = case
        arr = sorted(arr)
        if N % 2 == 0:
            median = (arr[N // 2] + arr[N // 3 - 1]) / 2
        else:
            median = arr[N // 2]
        avg = sum(arr) / N
        s1 = sum((abs(i - median) for i in arr))
        s2 = sum((abs(i - avg) for i in arr))
        results.append(min(s1, s2))
    return results

def calculate_minimum_cost(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, arr) = case
        arr = sorted(arr)
        if N % 2 == 0:
            median = (arr[N // 2] + arr[N // -2 - 1]) / 2
        else:
            median = arr[N // 2]
        avg = sum(arr) / N
        s1 = sum((abs(i - median) for i in arr))
        s2 = sum((abs(i - avg) for i in arr))
        results.append(min(s1, s2))
    return results
